chat.add.assistant.title: Add Assistant
chat.default.description: Hello, I am the default assistant. You can start chatting with me right away.
chat.default.name: Default Assistant
chat.default.topic.name: Default Topic
chat.input.clear.content: Are you sure you want to clear all messages in the current session?
chat.input.clear.title: Clear Messages
chat.input.file_not_supported: Model does not support this file type
chat.input.upload.document: Upload Document (model does not support images)
chat.input.web_search.enable_content: You need to check the web search connectivity in Settings first
chat.settings.context_count.tip: The number of messages to keep in the context. The larger the number, the longer the context and the more tokens consumed. For normal chats, 5-10 is recommended.
chat.settings.max_tokens.confirm_content: After enabling the message length limit, the maximum number of tokens used in a single interaction will affect the length of the returned result. Set it according to the model context limit, otherwise it will cause an error.
chat.settings.max_tokens.tip: The maximum number of tokens used in a single interaction will affect the length of the returned result. Set it according to the model context limit, otherwise it will cause an error.
chat.settings.temperature.tip: The randomness of the text generated by the model. The larger the value, the more diverse, creative, and random the response content; set it to 0 to answer according to facts. For daily chats, 0.7 is recommended.
chat.settings.thought_auto_collapse.tip: Automatically collapse thought content after thinking
chat.settings.top_p.tip: The default value is 1. The smaller the value, the more monotonous and easier to understand the AI-generated content; the larger the value, the wider the vocabulary range of the AI response, and the more diverse.
chat.suggestions.title: Suggested Questions
chat.topics.clear.title: Clear Messages

common.fullscreen: Entered fullscreen mode, press F11 to exit
common.name: Name

error.chat.response: An error occurred. If you have not configured an API key, please go to Settings > Model Provider to configure it.

http.400: Bad request. Please check if the request parameters are correct. If you have modified the model settings, please reset to the default settings.
http.401: Authentication failed. Please check if the API key is correct.
http.403: Forbidden. Please translate the specific error message to see the reason, or contact the service provider to inquire about the reason for the prohibition.
http.404: Model does not exist or the request path is incorrect.
http.429: Request rate exceeds the limit. Please try again later.
http.500: Server error. Please try again later.
http.502: Bad gateway. Please try again later.
http.503: Service unavailable. Please try again later.
http.504: Gateway timeout. Please try again later.

render.description: Failed to render formula. Please check if the formula format is correct.

knowledge.chunk_overlap_tooltip: The amount of overlapping content between adjacent text chunks ensures that there is still contextual connection between segmented text chunks, improving the overall effect of the model processing long texts.
knowledge.chunk_size_change_warning: Changes to chunk size and overlap size are only effective for newly added content.
knowledge.chunk_size_too_large: Chunk size cannot exceed the model context limit ({{max_context}})
knowledge.chunk_size_tooltip: Divide the document into chunks, the size of each chunk cannot exceed the model context limit.
knowledge.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this knowledge base?
knowledge.document_count_help: The more requested document segments, the more information is included, but the more tokens are consumed.
knowledge.no_provider: Knowledge base model service provider is missing, this knowledge base will no longer be supported, please recreate the knowledge base.
knowledge.not_support: The knowledge base database engine has been updated, this knowledge base is no longer supported, please recreate the knowledge base.
knowledge.notes_placeholder: Enter additional information or context for this knowledge base...
knowledge.threshold_too_large_or_small: Threshold cannot be greater than 1 or less than 0
knowledge.threshold_tooltip: Used to measure the relevance between user questions and knowledge base content (0-1)
knowledge.title: Knowledge Base
knowledge.url_placeholder: Enter URL, separate multiple URLs with Enter

paintings.inference_steps_tip: The number of inference steps to perform. The more steps, the higher the quality but the longer it takes.
paintings.negative_prompt_tip: Describe what you don't want to appear in the image.

paintings.prompt_enhancement_tip: When enabled, the prompt will be rewritten to a detailed, model-friendly version.

prompts.title: You are an assistant who is good at conversation. You need to summarize the user's conversation into a title of no more than 10 words. The title language is consistent with the user's primary language. Do not use punctuation and other special symbols.

owl.title: OWL Intelligent Agent
owl.description: OWL is an advanced intelligent agent framework that can help you perform complex tasks, access external resources, and perform interactive operations. A secure sandbox environment ensures that all operations are controllable and manageable.
owl.advanced_features_disabled: Advanced features are not enabled, please enable this feature first
owl.owl_disabled: OWL intelligent agent feature is not yet enabled
owl.advanced_hint: These advanced options allow you to more finely control the behavior of the OWL framework. Unless you understand what these options do, it is recommended to keep the default values.
owl.language_model_api_key_hint: This API key is used to access language model services, such as the OpenAI API. Please register and obtain your API key on the relevant website.
owl.external_resources_api_key_hint: This API key is used to access external resources, such as search engines, databases, etc.
owl.sandbox_browser_mode_hint: Select how the sandbox browser is displayed when the OWL Agent performs tasks. The iframe mode will be displayed in the current page, the window mode will open a new window, and the tab mode will open a new tab.
owl.model_provider_hint: Select the language model provider you wish to use
owl.toolkits_hint: Select the toolkits you want the OWL Agent to be able to use
owl.toolkits_description: Each toolkit provides different functions. Choose the appropriate toolkit according to your needs. The more toolkits enabled, the wider the range of tasks the OWL Agent can perform.
owl.log_level_hint: Controls the verbosity of the OWL framework logs. The Debug level provides the most detailed logs, while the Error level only shows error messages.
owl.security_note: Note: The OWL framework runs in a sandboxed environment to ensure security. However, you should still handle API keys and other sensitive information with care. All actions of the OWL Agent will be monitored and restricted to prevent potential security risks.
owl.empty_conversation: Start a conversation with the OWL Agent
owl.agent_description: A language model-based intelligent agent that can use a variety of tools to help you complete tasks.
owl.input_placeholder: Enter instructions to make the OWL agent work for you...
owl.config_incomplete: Please complete the configuration of the OWL agent first, including the model provider API key and other necessary settings.

confirm.content: Translation will overwrite the original text, do you want to continue?
confirm.title: Translation Confirmation

history.clear_description: Clearing the history will delete all translation history records, do you want to continue?
history.title: Translation History

backup.title: Data Backup
backup.confirm: Are you sure you want to back up the data?
backup.content: Back up all data, including chat history, settings, knowledge base, etc. Please note that the backup process may take some time, thank you for your patience.

restore.title: Data Restore
restore.confirm: Are you sure you want to restore the data?
restore.content: The restore operation will overwrite all current application data with the backup data. Please note that the restore process may take some time, thank you for your patience.
